title: Having Ingame Problem
body: So I duo with a friend and I was{{champion:202}}  first 10 mins were good pretty fine but as soon we got in tf my game got delay like 5 secs and then put me back where it supposed to be my ping was 47 no issue with ping and I don't know what is it  then I wanted to plat aram game to do mission and I got my lovely champ{{champion:67}} as soon all of them started fighting same thing just  having a delay  I see my self moving but everything else is freezing even creeps when I hit them. btw my first game was ranked with jhin I was going positive at early then lost to that was my fault of teamfight couldn't do thing and I'm so sad I don't wanna see that please riot could u fix it for me?

replies.body: That weird little 5 second delay between you clicking and your champion moving might be happening if your network has some issues with packet loss. Basically, packet loss means that some of the data coming from your network get lost or damaged before it reaches our servers. Let's use our [**log reader**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743) to analyze the network logs of the game that had the weird lag and we can find out for sure. Take a screenshot of what it says and post it here so we can go over it together.
so today I tried to record 6/23/2017 on custom and that's what I meant Is it from packet loss ?  https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yBLiWSNaMSI

Yeeeeeeep. That point around :55 seconds definitely looks like packet loss, and that screenshot shows about 5% which is enough to cause those delays. Most of the time packet loss happens somewhere along the route that your ISP sends your connection, but sometimes our tech guys can adjust some settings to help. Reach out to them with those logs in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).
Thank you very much I did the ticket thing <3
https://prnt.sc/fn85zg I think that's the one its from yesterday 22/06/2017
join the club man, riot says it is our ISP...
tbh with u my login took only 10 secs banning was fine and yea store was pretty slow but mostly was very bad at gameplay
